name: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water
name_original: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water
description: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water (ふしぎの海のナディア, Fushigi no Umi no Nadia) is a Japan-exclusive multiplatform video game released from 1991 to 1993. It is based on the anime series Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water.
